RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 23 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 23 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHORIST pressed the pace along the inside for a half, made the lead, surged under right handed urging in the two path through deep stretch and drew clear. ADMONISH bumped at the start, was unhurried, closed fast in the seven path through the stretch and got up for second. TIME FOR CUPID settled four wide down the backstretch, dropped to the rail entering the far turn, loomed boldly in upper stretch then was outfinished. UNCAPTURED FAITH bore in at the start for several strides bumping HERO'S DAUGHTER, offered a mild bid three wide into the far turn, had speed until deep stretch then came up empty. DREAM TO WIN vied for the lead four wide and weakened in the stretch. HERO'S DAUGHTER was bumped and forced inward at the start, rushed to the lead two wide, set a pressured pace for a half, kept on into the stretch then was used up. I MATTER was fractious in the gate, bumped at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Chorist
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, assumed command 2nd turn, drew off 2path

ENTRY.NAME: I Matter
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, bumped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Admonish
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, start, unhurried, closed fast 7path. up place

ENTRY.NAME: Hero's Daughter
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, forced inward start, rushed lead, early pace, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, middle move, 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Time for Cupid
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide early, dropped inside far turn, loomed rail, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Dream to Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 4 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A RaceSince Ma rch 23 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU'RE MY BOY BLUE pressed the pace two then three wide into the stretch, dug in under right then left handed urging and proved best in a stiff drive. VICTORY DIVISION was bumped start, saved ground under a firm hold, surged along the rail and finished. MANGA MAN never far back, swung wide and closed a gap late in the seven path. POWERFUL PHIL broke in front, set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished. THAT'S THE WAY bore in at the start bumping rivals then failed to menace. TIDE RISING was bumped hard at the start into VICTORY DIVISION then no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Powerful Phil
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace late stretch, outfinished 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Victory Division
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, saved ground, gamely second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Tide Rising
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: That's the Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Manga Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, swung wide, closed gap late 7path

ENTRY.NAME: You're My Boy Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, long drive, all out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 23, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 23 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 23 Allowed 4lbs. Cla iming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PISTOL PACKIN BOS sprinted to the front soon after the start, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and maintained her advantage under strong handling. CRISTALINDA never far back, rallied inside rivals into the stretch, drifted to the four path and finished second best. MY BELLE MICHELLE trailed into the stretch, shifted outside and found her best stride late. NORTHERN JOURNEY had good early speed three wide then failed to offer the needed response. HIGHLY EXPLOSIVE chased the winner from the three path into the stretch and gave way late.

ENTRY.NAME: Pistol Packin Bos
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Highly Explosive
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and Splurgin Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3path, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Journey
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, 3 wide, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Cristalinda
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, mild rally inside, drifted 4path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: My Belle Michelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, belatedly 5path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Claiming Purse 16400. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BON DEUX away alertly, quickly opened a daylight lead, set the pace for six furlongs, was headed briefly, responded under left handed urging and drew clear again winning under a strong hand ride. INSACIABLE PRINCE well placed, had a mild late rally in the six path and finished clear for second. ONE FOR THE MONEY found his best stride late inside. TOYI chased the winner for six furlongs, gained a narrow lead two wide entering the stretch, drifted to the six path and came up empty. EAST BY WEST broke outward and showed little. STREET TRAFFIC was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Insaciable Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild rally 6path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Toyi
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, led between calls 3/16pole, drifted, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Street Traffic
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: One for the Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late inside,

ENTRY.NAME: East by West
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Bon Deux
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, headed 3/16pole, fought back, drew off,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 23 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 23 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SURE FIRE READY prompted the pace three then two wide, assumed command at the top of the stretch and finished full of run under right handed urging to win going away while drifting out to the six path. KAT TRAX stalked pace the pace into stretch, swerved repeatedly while shying from the whip and finished second best. ROARING GINGER allowed to settle, had a mild late rally in the seven path. KISS VALENTINA away alertly, set the pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then weakened. QUEENOFTHEBUCKEYE vied for the early lead two wide then faded. TV TIZ GORGEOUS dropped back from an alert start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Kat Trax
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, swerved lane, shied whip, second best, 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Roaring Ginger
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, mild rally late 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Queenofthebuckeye
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 2 wide, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Sure Fire Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, full of run, going away, drifting out,

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss Valentina
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace upper stretch, inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Tv Tiz Gorgeous
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back, trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 98. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 23 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 23 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAKE RADIO chased the pace four then three wide, closed rapidly two wide through the turn, made the lead entering the stretch and drew off under right handed urging. UOTTALIKEIT bumped repeatedly at the start, sped up the inside to a clear lead soon thereafter, set the pace to the top of the stretch then was no match for the winner. FIRST HOMESTEAD unhurried early, had a mild late rally in the six path. SUSIE'S KID found his best stride late outside. ODIE bumped repeatedly at the start, chased the pace along the inside into the stretch then gave way. TEAM HUCKY was outrun. THEDAYOFTHEGREY chased the pace two wide between horses and faltered in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Susie's Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late outside

ENTRY.NAME: Team Hucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Uottalikeit
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped repeatedly start, rushed, set pace top lane, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Odie
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped repeatedly start, chased inside, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Thedayofthegrey
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline Robert C and Wilkinson Richard M
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, between horses, faltered lane

ENTRY.NAME: First Homestead
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild rally late 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Radio
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, closed rapidly turn, assumed command upper stretch, clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 23 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROYAL DRAGOON bumped at the start, was slow early, closed rapidly three wide through the stretch under left handed urging and was along in time. FLIPPING FISH allowed to settle, rallied two wide through the far turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch then couldn't handle the winner. TRIVISTA void of early speed, found his best stride late four wide in the six path. OTIS OTIS OTIS bumped at the start, rushed to a clear lead soon thereafter, set the pace into the stretch then weakened late. UNIDENTIFIED MAN failed to menace. SMASH chased the pace into the far turn then folded in the stretch. PER HISA RULING DATED 5/29/2023 ROYAL DRAGOON WAS DQ'D DUE TO A WHIP VIOLATION.

ENTRY.NAME: Trivista
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, best stride late 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Unidentified Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Smash
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, folded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Otis Otis Otis
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, rushed clear, set pace upper stretch, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Royal Dragoon
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Urieta Johanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, slow early, closed fast, 3 wide, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Flipping Fish
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rallied 2 wide 2nd turn, led, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 23 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 23 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VENTURE ON allowed to settle along the rail, responded readily when set down, got through to make the lead in deep stretch, drifted out to the four path and was along in time under right handed urging. INTO GOLD sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set the pace into the stretch, drifted to the seven path giving up the lead and held on for second. IN THE MIDST close up early, dropped back on the backstretch and shifted outside, swung wide entering the stretch and came on again. ANIMO ROBERTO forwardly place from the start four wide, moved closer to the leader two wide on the far turn, remained a sharp threat until deep stretch then came up empty. GIV'EM THE BIZ stalked the pace three wide and gave way in the stretch. LIL RICKYS JEWEL chased the early pace and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: In the Midst
ENTRY.COMMENT: close early, dropped back, swung wide, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Rickys Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Venture On
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, saved ground, got through, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Animo Roberto
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 2 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Into Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: sped clear, set pace, drifted 7path, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Giv'em the Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, gave way lane
